MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH2 postcode area of Chester affecting properties in Tomkinson Street, Phillip Street, Pickering Street and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 9:32am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:29am on 12th February 2021
